welcome_message_body: "Welcome to West Hanover, where small-town charm meets big-city opportunities. We're known for our vibrant community, rich history, and beautiful landscapes. We invite you to explore and experience all that our beloved city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Harrisburg International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Harrisburg International Airport serves domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Harrisburg International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free Wi-Fi network by selecting 'HIA Free Wi-Fi' and agreeing to the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at York Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at York Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lancaster Airport serves all domestic flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lancaster Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.
